description: This file defines a Python class 'PythonTools' that provides various utility methods for executing Python code, managing files, and installing packages, intended for use within a larger project. It includes functions for saving and running code, reading files, listing directory contents, and installing packages via pip or uv.

classes.name: PythonTools
classes.description: A utility class for executing Python code, managing files, and installing packages, extending the 'Toolkit' class.

methods.name: save_to_file_and_run
methods.description: Saves Python code to a file and executes it, optionally returning a specific variable's value.

methods.name: run_python_file_return_variable
methods.description: Runs a Python file and optionally returns a specific variable's value.

methods.name: read_file
methods.description: Reads and returns the contents of a specified file.

methods.name: list_files
methods.description: Lists all files in the base directory.

methods.name: run_python_code
methods.description: Executes Python code in the current environment, optionally returning a variable's value.

methods.name: pip_install_package
methods.description: Installs a Python package using pip.

methods.name: uv_pip_install_package
methods.description: Installs a Python package using uv and pip.
